resources.string: FRIENDS ARE MEDICINE FOR WOUNDED HEART,AND VITAMINS FOR A HOPEFUL SOUL!!
LOVE ISN\'T EASY,IT MUST BE FOUGHT FOR,BECAUSE ONCE FOUND,IT CAN NEVER BE REPLACED.
AFFECTION IS THE BROADEST BASIS OF A GOOD LIFE.
A HAPPY MARRIAGE IS THE UNION OF TWO GOOD FORGIVERS....
FORGIVE YOUR ENEMIES BUT NEVER FORGET THEIR NAMES!!
BEING A BROTHER/SISTER IS EVEN GREATER THAN BEING A SUPERHERO..
